fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Name: Phan Tuan Anh.  
Date of Birth: Jan 06th, 1992. 
Gender: Male. 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
Become a professional, fully experienced and fullstack developer. Hope become a project 
manager in future.  
EDUCATION 
From 2010 to 2015: 
Hanoi University of Science and Technology 
Institute of International Education  
Latrobe University Program 
ACHIEVEMENT 
Scholarship of Institute of International Education 
in year 2012 – 2013. 
Scholarship of Institute of International Education 
in year 2013 – 2014. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
March 2018 to now: 
Mobile developer at VPBank digital factory 
Description: The job involved working with mobile 
project. Main projects are VPBank Dream Mobile 
(react native). 
Working framework: Agile. 
New language learning: Nodejs (expressjs, reactjs, 
Sequelizejs), PostgreSQL. 
Product link: 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/vpbank-
dream/id1361000712?mt=8  
February 2017 to March 2018: 
Mobile developer at Appota 
Description: The job involved working with iOS and 
web projects. Main applications are Gamota Chat 
(native), Gamota Analytics (Mobile Native), 
Gamota Vip (Mobile Native), Gamota customer’s 
feedback management tool (golang), Appota 
Wallet (supporting react native). 
Working framework: Scrum. 
New language learning: Golang, PHP, Nodejs. 
Product link: 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/v%C3%AD-
appota/id1198481412?l=vi&mt=8  
Mar 2016 to February 2017: 
Senior iOS developer at VNP Groups 
Description: The job involved working with iOS and 
mobile projects. Main applications are Vatgia 
(native) and weSave (React native). 
Working framework: Scrum. 
New language learning: React native. 
Product link: 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vat-gia-happy-
shopping/id1018114852?mt=8 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/wesave-
c%E1%BA%ADp-nh%E1%BA%ADt-%C6%B0u-
%C4%91%C3%A3i/id1189024131?l=vi&mt=8  
From Mar 2015 to Mar 2016: 
Junior iOS developer at MQ ICT Solutions 
Description: The job involved working with iOS 
project of Japanese customers. Join in weekly 
meeting, directly communicating to make clear 
specifications. Learning to use Crashlytics, Github 
with Source Tree client, Redmine. 
Working framework: none. 
New language learning: HTML, CSS, PHP. 
Product link: 
https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/%E7%BE%8E%E6
%AD%B4bireki/id922858131?mt=8  
From Nov 2013 to Feb 2015: 
Junior iOS Developer at Libre Company. 
Description: This is job with a start-up company, 
started working with Window Phone development 
about 2 months and then iOS development. 
Learning to use Cocoa pods, SVN and Mantis bug 
tracker. 
New language learning: Objective-C. 
Feb 2012 to Oct 2013: 
Internship at Institute of Information Technology 
of Vietnam Academy of Science and Technology 
Description: I took part in training courses about 
Microsoft technology especially C# and Window 
Phone. 
SKILLS 
Programming skills: 
Objective-C: Upper-Intermediate. 
Swift: Upper-Intermediate. 
Nodejs, Reactjs, React Native: Intermediate. 
SQL: Beginner. 
CSS, PHP, JavaScript, HTML: Intermediate. 
C#: Intermediate. 
Computer skills: 
MS Office: Intermediate. 
Mac: Advanced. 
Linux: Intermediate. 
SVN: Intermediate. 
Other skills: 
Communication and teamwork. 
English:  
Listening: Intermediate. 
Speaking: Intermediate. 
Reading: Advanced. 
Writing: Intermediate. 
THE POSITION 
Senior iOS Developer 
HOBBIES 
Listening to music, watching movies, traveling, finding out 
about new technology, studying new programming 
languages. 
PERSONAL QUALITIES 
Very honest and trustful, get along well with people. 
Adaptable and quick to learn new skills. 
OTHERS PRODUCTS 
Tri thức VN: 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/tr%C3%AD-
th%E1%BB%A9c-vn/id1198056412?mt=8  
English epoch times 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/english-epoch-
times/id670443321?mt=8  
Mclouds 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/mclouds/id1326077997?
l=vi&mt=8
